title: Interpretation of a dream about a big snake and a small snake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a large snake and a small snake in a dream and the snake is an animal and has a scary shape and appearance and can cause insomnia and anxiety when you see it in a dream and you may be interested in meeting the dead father in a dream the person who dreams, and it can indicate disputes and disagreements, and we will look in this article at seeing a large and small snake in a dream on the summit site. Interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dream It indicates the presence of evil people and envy of the Lord. Interpretation of a dream about a large snake attacking me It indicates many problems facing the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream of a snake chasing me in the house It indicates haters and envious people who may be relatives or friends. Interpretation of dreams of a snake chasing me and I am afraid of my man It indicates his wife's enemies or her illness. Read also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of a dream of a snake for a man Interpretation of seeing a large snake and a small snake in a dream If one sees a snake in a dream, this means enemies and friends who harbor hostility, hatred and hypocrites. Seeing a snake in a married man's dream indicates the many problems he is exposed to and the hardships and obstacles. Seeing a large snake in a dream of a divorced man or A widower to the presence of an enemy lurking around him, and the black snake indicates the presence of a very evil person conspiring against the dreamer. And if a young man sees the black snake, the vision shows the pitfalls and obstacles he faces in his life journey. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream Interpretation of a dream of a married man and his killer about a snake The snake in a dream indicates crises, tribulations and obstacles in life and can indicate a difficult, malicious and jealous life. Seeing the killing of a snake means getting rid of problems and troubles, and seeing its killing by cutting the snake into small pieces may indicate marital problems and arguments leading to separation and divorce. Seeing the snake cut into three pieces indicates the divorce of the husband three times irrevocably, so attention must be paid to this and not let the differences take a more serious path and turn to God until these problems end and the quarrels end and he is afflicted. Marital life is settled. The vision may indicate a person who is very hostile to him. Read also: Carrying a friend's hand in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a small snake and then killing a married womanIf you see a snake in a dream for a married, pregnant, divorced or widowed woman, this indicates the presence of enemies hiding in plain sight. Seeing a small snake indicates enemies who are trying to spoil her life, so keep this in mind and do not listen to the spiteful and envious, do not reveal the secrets of her home, and do not talk about her private life in front of others. You may also be interested in knowing: The accident in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a snake bite and the exit of poisonSnake bites can indicate the presence of a lot of money. Snake bites can indicate bad friends. This vision may indicate the disasters that this person is exposed to and then he is freed. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a snake with its colors from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake in its colors: The snake is considered a reptile and has many types and colors, and seeing it in reality scares many people, so dreaming about a snake makes the dreamer rush to search for the different meanings and associations associated with this dream, and in the following lines we will explain them in some detail. Interpretation of a dream about a snake in its colors: If Someone saw a brown snake in a dream, this is a sign that he will face some crises in his life that will make him feel sad and sad, and the reason for this is someone he loves, so he should not trust him easily. Anyone. Whoever watches a black snake in his sleep, this leads to being surrounded by many rivals and rivals in his life and to lack of security and comfort during this time. When a sick person dreams of a white snake, this is a sign that Almighty God will grant him a speedy recovery, and he will enjoy good health. Good and live a normal life. And if you see during your sleep that you are eating a green snake, this proves the stable psychological state that you enjoy at this time in your life and the feeling of happiness and comfort, as well as the ample diet and good abundance to come. This is the way to you. Interpretation of a dream about a snake in its colors by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a snake in its colors in a dream does not bode well for the dreamer from the point of view of the great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin, may God have mercy on him, because it symbolizes the bad things that he will experience in the coming period. If one sees a yellow snake in his bedroom during... His sleep is due to the many family disputes that he is going through these days and the state of tension and anxiety that he feels. Whoever dreams of a weak black snake, this is a sign that he is a difficult person, strict in his opinion, and does not even allow listening to the opinion of others. The red snake if he sees it in the bathroom in a dream This is a sign of touching the jinn or devils, and the dreamer must protect himself by reading the Qur’an, remembering, and seeking forgiveness. Interpretation of a dream about a snake in its colors for single people. If a girl dreams of a white snake, this is a sign that one of her rivals will suffer from a serious illness in the coming period and will stay away from her. In the event that an unmarried woman dreams that she If she bought a green snake and took it home with her, this will lead to an inappropriate partner who will hold grudges and hatred and will hurt her a lot, and you should stay away from her. And remove it from her life. If the girl is a science student and dreams that she kills a black snake, this proves that she has succeeded in her studies and obtained the highest academic titles. If the girl kills a white snake in a dream, it will symbolize the diseases and failure that she will suffer from in her life, whether it is On a practical, academic, or personal level. Interpretation of a dream about a snake in its colors for a married woman. If a woman dreams of many red snakes, this is a sign that she is surrounded by people who are watching her every step and seeking to know everything that happens in her home, so she must be careful and not reveal her secrets to anyone. If a married woman sees in a dream a white snake under her bed, this leads to her clear and great weakness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a threat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a threat in a dream, the meaning of a threat in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, a man, the meaning of a death threat, seeing a threat and blackmail, the symbol of a threat using a gun, the interpretation of threatening a dead person in a dream, a threat or blackmail is a warning from someone that he will harm Another person, whether it is physical or moral harm, when we see threats and dangers in a dream, we feel fear and anxiety, and we do not know its correct interpretation. Therefore, we will interpret it for you today with the correct interpretation in this article through the interpretation of seeing a threat in a dream according to the best jurists and translators. Interpretation of a dream about a threat by Ibn Sirin: The interpretation of seeing a threat in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate a change in the fortuneteller’s life for the better, justice and his desires. Dreaming of being afraid of a threat in a dream is evidence of fear in reality, a feeling of despair, stress, disappointment and anxiety in the future. Seeing a threat from a stranger in a dream indicates that the dreamer is committing many sins, but he will bring repentance and God will guide him. Seeing yourself running away A threat in a dream means that God responds and responds to what the dreamer has asked for in the past period. The dream of seeing the threat of death in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has faced many difficulties and crises, but he quickly ignores them. Interpretation of a dream of a threat from Imam Al-Sadiq: Interpretation of a dream about the danger of harm in a dream As Imam Al-Sadiq indicated that it indicates a calamity and a major opinion problem that is difficult to solve. Seeing threats and blackmail in a dream, this indicates the disappearance of worries and sorrows, the elimination of problems and conflicts with the family and recovery from diseases. Dreaming of a knife being threatened in a dream is an ominous sign of loss. A person dear to the fortuneteller, or the loss of something valuable or a large material loss. Seeing the threat of scandal in a dream is evidence that there are many secrets in the dreamer’s life and he is afraid that they will be revealed in reality. A dream in which the dreamer sees threats and intimidation indicates that the dreamer is in a psychological state. Bad because he was betrayed and betrayed by someone close to him. Interpretation of a dream about threats to a single woman: Interpretation of seeing a threat from a familiar person in a dream for an unmarried woman is an indication of the approaching date of her engagement and marriage to this person and her happiness with him. If you dream that you are threatening an unknown person In a dream for an unmarried woman, it means the fulfillment of desires and success in her professional and personal life. Seeing the threat of death in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates a failed romantic relationship that will cause her sadness and many problems. Seeing the danger of scandal in a dream for an unmarried woman can be evidence of... Secrets in her life, and she is afraid that someone will approach these secrets. Interpretation of a dream about the danger of kidnapping in a dream for a single woman, and this indicates that she has heard a lot of good news about her close marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a threat to a married woman: And a married woman’s dream of seeing a living threat to the neighborhood in The dream is evidence that she is committing many sins and transgressions and that she must repent and seek forgiveness

title: The most prominent clues to the interpretation of a dream about deliberately eating meat

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about intending to eat meat in a dream: Meat is one of the most important fatty diets around which millions of people gather. It helps the body rebuild damaged cells and tissues and provides it with the necessary energy, especially for those who exercise continuously, but what about seeing meat in a dream? What is the significance of looking at the flesh of intention specifically? This vision has many connotations that vary based on many things, such as whether you buy it, distribute it to someone, or eat from it, and what is important to us in this context is to mention the connotations and symbols of seeing the intention of meat. In a dream. Interpretation of a dream about intentional meat: Seeing meat in a dream generally expresses physical requirements that are reflected in the body’s needs. The vision acts as a guiding message for the person to provide himself with the appropriate amount of food that provides him with the energy he needs to continue his life normally. This vision also refers to the emotional and psychological aspects, as each aspect has its own needs, and the viewer must not only be satisfied with what the body insists on, but must also work Providing sufficient sleep to relax the nerves and mind, and take some time to relax to remove the worries of the soul. As for seeing consistency of intention in a dream, this vision shows the inability to properly satisfy natural needs and entering into the cycle of suffering and exhaustion that pushes a person to settle as he is. And then he misses many opportunities without being able to do so. Exploiting them in an ideal way. Seeing raw meat in a dream also symbolizes the emergence of some evil or going through a serious crisis that is difficult to deal with or get rid of. If the meat is cut into slices, this indicates the end of a dark period in a person’s life or the death of a trial and the evil that was coming to him. And the good judgment that distinguishes the fortune teller from others is what qualifies him. To predict some events and then avoid them if they are bad and harmful. And if a person sees that he is eating meat that has been well cleansed, this expresses a lot of goodness, abundant food, and an abundance of fruits that he reaps after extreme toil and misery. If the dreamer sees beef and eats from it, this indicates Comfortable, making a lot of money, high profit rate, being smart in dealing with all situations, entering into relationships where there is mutual benefit, and having a period of prosperity. Prosperity and ample living. If the beef is raw, then this vision alerts the monarch to investigate his source of livelihood and ascertain the source from which he earns money. Interpretation of a dream about raw meat by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of meat without specifying that whoever sees the meat or eats from it, this indicates On fatigue, pain, constant injury, a lot of sadness, gossip, gossip and the paths that a person follows. Therefore, he does not know the meaning of this and the purpose of what he does in all his actions. If the meat is very soft, this indicates a serious illness or a sudden approach to life. As for the one who saw the intention, this vision does not carry any good and symbolizes the loss of something dear to the person Or light

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the front seat according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the front seat, controlled by the person sitting at the steering wheel next to the dreamer or the driver. In general, the car, as one of the modern means of transportation, expresses the clear change that occurs to the dreamer, whether that is a negative or positive change according to the details of the dream. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the front seat by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about driving a car in the front seatThe interpretation of the dream said that the person sitting in the seat Al-Amami is a person who has ambitions that some may find difficult to achieve, but he is determined to achieve them, due to his great confidence in his abilities, and he will actually get what he is. Wants. He wants the time he planned or a little sooner. A married woman who sits like this and drives the car away is a good sign of her marital happiness and the overwhelming love that unites her with her husband, and that there is a significant rise in the social level of the family due to the husband’s struggle and diligence. But if it is an old car and it breaks down On the road, it means that there are many difficulties on the fortuneteller's path to his goal, such as the plans of a young man seeking work or marrying a girl he likes. But if he dies while driving a car, this is not a good sign that life is the period that follows it will be full of negative events that cause him great sadness. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the front seat by Ibn Sirin There was no type of car in the time of Ibn Sirin and other great imams In the interpretation of dreams, therefore, we will end with a description of the mountain that Ibn Sirin previously explained in his opinions, as it has the same purpose of moving, even if the speeds change, so that the car passes here to shorten the time. The front seat of the car for the dreamer means that he is determined to achieve his ambitions and goals without regard to whom. He tries to reduce or discourage it, and if someone is sitting next to him, then there is a partnership that will bring goodness to him. Both parties, whether it is a marriage or a partnership in a profitable business. If the car is turned right and left, this indicates a repetition of events for the dreamer and increases his sadness during this period. He may fail again and again, but he insists on continuing. Looking for interpretations of Ibn Sirin? Enter from Google and see them all Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site.Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the front seat for a single woman. For an unmarried girl, the front seat of a luxury car expresses that she is fulfilling her heart’s desire related to her studies, if her ambitions are directed towards this goal, to one day be among The characters listed as Lebanon thus become a source of pride for everyone who has a close or distant kinship with them. But in the case of a simple girl who only wants to live under the care of a man who protects and defends her, and feels safe and reassured by his side, her dream here is an indication of May God (Glory be to Him) provide for her. She is with this person and her life with him is calm and stable. In an unmarried woman’s dream, if she rides an old car that is moving slowly, then in reality she is trying with all her might to overcome some obstacles and may be exposed to psychological damage during this period.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing an old woman in a dream with all the details?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an old woman via the Hadot website, which specializes in dream interpretation and the author of important dream interpretation books such as Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream about an old woman. Ibn Sirin explained to us that seeing an old woman in a dream indicates kindness and support. And if one of you sees an old woman in a dream Everyone's faces are full, as this is a sign that his condition will change for the better, and God knows best. Seeing an old woman among them, poor and sad, is evidence of the arrival of a lot of money to the dreamer. And seeing an old woman in a dream as a perfect person afflicted with a disease indicates his recovery from this disease, God forbid. When you see an old woman in a dream, plump, fragile, and weak, and it is difficult for her to move and walk, this indicates that the dreamer will recover soon, and God knows best. Why does an old woman dream in a man’s dream? A man sees an old woman in a dream full of many meanings, and it is always related to food and kindness. The fact that the patient sees An old woman in a full dream testifies that he has recovered from illness and emerged from adversity. They say that when a man sees in a dream a full old woman with a fat body, this indicates great support and kindness. And to see in a dream a full man committing the sins of an old woman testifies that he should deny His sins and return to God, and God knows best. Why does an old woman dream of a single woman? Seeing an old woman or an elderly woman in a dream is a sign of support and kindness and that God will make her happy. If he sees an old woman praying or lamenting, this indicates marriage to a good husband. And seeing a single girl in a dream is full of With old women it always speaks of goodness, happiness and joy, but God knows best. Why does an old woman dream of a married woman? Seeing an old married woman in a dream who is full is a sign of kindness and nourishment with an imminent pregnancy. And when an old woman sees a set in a dream, it always speaks of goodness, a change of situation and support And dreaming of a married old woman in a dream is a sign of goodness, and that God is pleased with her, and that she is on the straight path, and God knows best. Why does a pregnant woman dream? Seeing a plump, pregnant old woman in a dream means that she will give birth easily. And when you see in a dream a plump, non-Muslim old woman This indicates the complexity of her pregnancy and increased fatigue during childbirth, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant old woman in a dream always shows her kindness and support and the ease of her birth and the birth of her fetus, and that her fetus will be born in good health, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream a perfect old woman who helps and assists her, this is evidence On the arrival of a lot of food and a lot of goodness, but God knows best. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a white sheep

preview.html: Many interpreters, whether modern or ancient, may see it as one of the dreams that we bring good news, praise be to God Almighty, and through this distinguished website, that is, the interpreter, we will present all the cases to explain this vision, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a white sheep in a dream for one girlWhen she sees An unmarried girl dreams that there is a white sheep next to her. This indicates that she is engaged to a man, but he is of weak character, and God knows best. While she sees a small white sheep in an unmarried girl’s dream, it portends the coming of exciting goodness, thanks to the Almighty God. It was also said that seeing a small white sheep , an unmarried girl in a dream. It is a sign of the wise behavior of the fortune teller in her life. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees that she is raising a white sheep in a dream. The vision indicates the presence of useful friends in her life. Also, seeing a single white sheep in an unmarried girl’s dream means She is a girl who cares about appearance and is wise. One of the dream interpreters says that seeing a white sheep in a dream is for one girl. It is an indication of successive successes in the life of the dreamer. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a white sheep in a dream for a married womanWhen we talk about Seeing a white sheep in a married woman’s dream. By this we mean many good things that come to her by the grace of Almighty God. Either one white sheep in a married woman’s dream. It indicates the acquisition of a lot of money in the near future, God willing. It was said that you see a single white sheep. In a married woman’s dream. One of the signs of an imminent pregnancy, God willing. Giving a white sheep to someone in a married woman’s dream indicates good deeds done by the dreamer. However, if the husband gives the wife a white sheep in a married woman’s dream, she will take a lot of money from her husband and she Awake. If a stranger presents white letters to a married woman in a dream. This means that he made a promise to someone, but did not implement it, and God is the Most High, the All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a white sheep in a dream for a man and its meaning. Chasing a white sheep in a married man’s dream means that he is holding on to something in His life and he must not despair. Seeing a white sheep being chased in a dream by a married man indicates lawful profit and a lot of money thanks to God Almighty. Also, a white sheep on a married man’s bed in a dream indicates a gentle wife who enjoys beauty. And since the vision of buying a sheep A white baby in a married man’s dream is a sign that his wife is pregnant, God willing. If a married man sees a flock of white sheep in a dream, this may mean that many good things will come his way soon. Either a married man sees that his wife is raising many sheep in a dream. White. It means that the wife is raising her children properly. Maybe seeing raising white sheep in a married man’s dream indicates a dream. However, soon his wife gives him money that they benefit from. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing a white sheep in a pregnant woman’s dream Its interpretation is that the woman interprets the truth

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing crying in a dreamInterpretation of dreams about crying in a dream with a detailed and correct scientific interpretation with the leading scholars of dream interpretation, it is human nature to feel pain and crying is also a human characteristic, and tears are known as a liquid substance with a salty taste that descends from the tear glands in the eye, tears flow as a result of feelings of joy or human sadness. Interpretation of a cry of vision Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin went on to interpret crying in a dream to say: It indicates joy, happiness and happiness if it is not accompanied by crying or wailing. As for if a person sees that he is shedding tears and screaming and crying in a dream, this indicates that the owner of the dream will face hardship from the family. Seeing crying in a dream only without screaming and wailing indicates the end of anxiety and imminent deception. Interpretation of a dream about seeing severe crying from injustice in a dream, which sometimes indicates a long life. As for the one who sees in a dream that he is shedding tears without tears and delaying them, this vision is undesirable and indicates the emergence of bad things. As for the one who dreams that he is crying blood, this indicates that an event in the past that he still regrets. Dream of crying In the rain in a dream indicates that the dreamer has repented for a sin he committed. Interpretation of crying in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi's interpretation of crying in a dream is not much different from Ibn Sirin's interpretation. Al-Nabulsi interprets crying in a dream. If crying is accompanied by black clothes, screaming and signs in the dream, this indicates sadness and disappointment. However, if crying is out of fear of God Almighty, or from hearing the Holy Qur’an, or the dreamer's sadness over a sin he committed in the past, this indicates the disappearance of worry and opening the chest. Interpretation of dreams for a dream of screaming out of fear, which indicates a long life as it indicates nourishment. We conclude from Al-Nabulsi's interpretation that crying in a dream is nothing but tears, it has a good connotation and it is desirable to see it. However, if crying is accompanied by screaming and signs in the dream, it is not desirable to see it; Because of its bad connotations. Interpretation of seeing Ibn Shaheen crying Seeing crying without screaming in a dream is evidence of distress and the death of the great anxiety that the dreamer was causing. Crying accompanied by screaming in a dream is evidence of something bad happening. Dreaming of tears in the eyes without crying towards Ibn Shaheen in a dream is evidence of achieving his goals. Seeing him crying in a dream without tears is a sign of deep remorse on the part of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream of crying for a single woman Seeing her crying without lamentation in an unmarried girl's dream is evidence of kindness, livelihood, pleasure, and the approaching date of marriage. Interpretation of a dream of crying on the wedding day in an unmarried woman's dream is evidence that the girl will get the person she longs for. Seeing crying accompanied by sobbing and screaming in an unmarried girl's dream is evidence that the girl is unmarried, regardless of her desire to marry. Interpretation of a dream of crying on the engagement day in a dream and proof of the girl's remorse. Seeing crying in a closed place away from people in an unmarried girl's dream is evidence of the girl's failure to achieve the goals she seeks

title: Cutting off the head of a green snake in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a green snake and dividing it in a dream comes to many people. What is the meaning of this vision and what we will know in the following lines from your website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing a green snake with its head cut off in a dream for a single girl. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off the head of a green snake indicates the fulfillment of desires and dreams. A woman’s dream indicates A single woman cutting off the head of a snake in a dream indicates success in her emotional and professional life. A dream about the presence of a snake in a dream for an unmarried woman and cutting off its head indicates emotional differences in her life. Likewise, an unmarried girl dreams of cutting off the head of a snake in her dream. The vision leads to excellence in life. And study and the success of her commitment. If she was unmarried and engaged and saw the head of a green snake being cut off. The vision indicated great sadness and adversity in her life. If the unmarried woman faced some disagreements and dreamed of cutting off the head of a green snake. The vision suggests that she will soon end all these disagreements and will be happy in her life. If The girl was single and dreamed that the head of a snake fell on her with a knife. The vision will soon lead to her engagement and her huge livelihood. See also: Interpretation of a snake in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a headless green snake in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman dreams that she cuts off the head of a snake in a dream. Leads to Resolving all disputes and obstacles that affect her married life. Seeing a married woman cutting off the head of a snake in a dream, the dream may be that she is far away from the enemy forever. Seeing a snake killing a married woman, shows the end of envy and hatred. A dream of a married woman killing snakes indicates the transformation of her life and the expansion Her scope of living. A married woman dreams of cutting off the head of a green snake in a dream. It shows that there are people who are hurting her in her life. If a married woman sees that in a dream she kisses a big snake and cuts off its head. The vision indicates that the dreamer will meet a person who will create problems for her. Seeing a snake in a dream A married woman also means that there are conflicts and problems. If a married woman dreams that she kills a snake and splits its head in two in her dream. The vision then shows that there are haters and onlookers in her life. But if the snake is green and she sees it cutting off its head, the vision will lead to goodness and happiness. Interpretation of the vision A headless green snake in a dream about a man and its meaning. If a person sees in his dream that he is stepping on a large snake and cutting off its head with a stick. A vision of him soon marrying a beautiful lady indicates his wife. If a snake’s head is cut off with a sword, this is good news for him. If a person dreams that he is cutting off the head of a snake in front of People in the market. The vision turns into a profitable business for the visionary. A man dreams of cutting off the head of a large snake in a dream. The vision indicates the possibility of conflicts and wars in the dreamer’s city. It can also mean the victory of the enemy in the war and the destruction of the city. If one sees himself walking in a large market And he found a large snake attacking him. The vision may soon lead to victory over his enemies. If one sees that he is in a market and collecting large snakes in a dream. The vision indicates that the dreamer will plan a great deception for his enemies, causing great harm to them. Read also

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about an engagement ring for single women, gold, silver, and diamonds?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an engagement ring for a single woman An engagement ring is one of the dreams that an unmarried woman often sees in her sleep, especially if she thinks about it a lot or suffers from delayed marriage, and of course this vision controls her after she wakes up from her sleep and begins to search for the meaning and its interpretation according to what was mentioned in the books of scholars in the science of dream interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about an engagement ring for a single woman Seeing an engagement ring in a dream for singles is considered one of the praiseworthy visions for her, as it indicates her close relationship with a suitable person, but there are still other indications that the vision carries according to the type of this ring and the metal from which it was made, but also according to the psychological state of the girl. If a girl sees that her hand has a gold ring, she will marry a wealthy man, but she will suffer a lot of trouble with him during the engagement period, and this quarrel may arise due to the difference in their principles or ideas in life. There is also a girl who sees in her dream that her ring is made of diamonds, and the vision here indicates the extent of the popularity of the person she will be associated with, as he may be famous among people, as it shows overwhelming overwhelming. The happiness that the girl lives with this man. As for Imam Al-Sadiq, he indicates that this vision in general in a girl's dream is evidence of major transformations in her life, and these changes are not necessarily related to marriage and engagement, but rather it is possible to move from one house to another. For example, with her family, or discovering a suitable job for her in the future, or excelling in her studies if she is of school age, etc. Psychologists also had another point of view on this vision: They said that the person who thinks and focuses on this idea in his mind, makes it an imprint on the subconscious, which remains awake during sleep, and produces these dreams that make him happy and happy. And happy. Fulfills his idea. But if the vision is not a dream, it actually expresses a transition to a new stage in the girl's life, and this change is described as bad or good according to the type of ring material. And if he sees her wearing it, he will achieve what he aspires to. Interpretation of a dream about an engagement ring for a single woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned that this vision is evidence that the girl will be blessed soon with someone who marries her, and her circumstances with this fiancée and her future life with him depend on the type of ring. It is suitable for her, and it is better for her to break the engagement before the marriage takes place and live an unhappily life with him. As for what is made of iron, it is evidence of her emotional attachment to the person in bad ways, and the girl must cut off her connection with him immediately, and be patient and wait for God to give her the right husband. He also said that the ring in the girl’s hand, if she feels that it is tight or wide on her, this is an indication of the lack of equality between the engaged or emotionally attached without a formal bond, but if the engagement ring falls from her to the ground, she said that this vision expresses the achievement of her goals in life. Engagement ring dream Interpretation of a dream about wearing an engagement ring in a dream for a single woman This vision is joy for the dreamer and
